name: bohemian
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who is interested in artistic and unusual things, for example art, music, or literature, and lives in an informal way that ignores the usually accepted ways of behaving

relating to or typical of a bohemian: a bohemian lifestyle The area has a bohemian atmosphere, busy with small independent shops and cafes.
More examplesFewer examplesMy family consider me very bohemian.These sunglasses look great worn with an oversized hat for an artistic bohemian look.He enjoyed a fairly conventional, if slightly bohemian childhood.

/boʊˈhi·mi·ən/
She belonged to a West Coast group of bohemian writers and intellectuals.
